primevc.core.validators.PercentIntRangeValidator

type
class
extends
IntRangeValidator
PercentIntRangeValidator is a class which does the same as IntRangeValidator. The class adds 2 properties to the validator, minPercent and maxPercent which allow to define a min and max-value as a relative value to another object. This is most handy in a layout with for example a min-width and a max-width defined in percentages. The actual value of the IntRangeValidator will change every time the parent of a layoutclient changes, but the percentage value stays the same.
